parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause the steering wheel to become difficult to turn or lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the steering wheel vibrates violently
the steering wheel feels loose or has excessive play
the steering wheel makes clicking or clunking sounds
the steering wheel becomes stuck or free-wheeling
the vehicle is hard to control
and the airbag deploys unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the intermediate shaft can cause the steering wheel to become difficult to turn or lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the steering wheel vibrates violently
the steering wheel feels loose or has excessive play
the steering wheel makes clicking or clunking sounds
the steering wheel becomes stuck or free-wheeling
the vehicle is hard to control
and the airbag deploys unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the upper steering shaft can cause the steering wheel to become difficult to turn or lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the steering wheel vibrates violently
the steering wheel feels loose or has excessive play
the steering wheel makes clicking or clunking sounds
the steering wheel becomes stuck or free-wheeling
the vehicle is hard to control
and the airbag deploys unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Acceleration due to Throttle Body Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unintended acceleration of the vehicle can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially when the vehicle is in heavy traffic or approaching a stop.
symptoms: The engine RPM increases suddenly
the vehicle accelerates on its own
the vehicle lunges forward
the vehicle moves forward despite the brake being applied
the throttle body revs up
the vehicle's RPM gauge reaches high levels (e.g.
over 3

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended increase in engine RPM can cause the vehicle to surge forward, potentially leading to accidents or loss of control, especially when the driver is attempting to brake.
symptoms: Engine RPM increases to maximum level when braking
pulling the car forward while the brakes are applied
sudden loss of power
and return to normal engine RPM when the brakes are released.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent loss of power and surge can cause a sudden loss of control, potentially leading to accidents, especially when driving at high speeds or navigating sharp turns.
symptoms: Sudden loss of power
surge or jolt feeling in the vehicle
loss of power for a brief moment
and tachometer shows a loss of power. The issue is triggered by specific conditions
such as driving uphill at high speeds
making a sharp turn left
or swaying the rear of the vehicle to the left.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The peeling of paint on the hood and top can lead to rust and corrosion, potentially affecting the vehicle's structural integrity. The malfunctioning heater blend door can cause discomfort and distraction for the driver and passengers.
symptoms: Paint peeling on the hood and top
and the heater blend door not working properly.
